message: This is my first offer. I propose we divide the money 60/40 in favor of Alice.
I'm willing to give you a bigger share, but not that big. This is my counteroffer.
Considering the inflation, I've adjusted my offer. I propose we divide the money 56/44 in favor of Alice.
I'm getting desperate, but I still want to hold on to some value. This is my new offer.
